item.title: GM
item.description: score:78 Chances: Positive news about free cash flow and EV profits Shift toward plug-in hybrids is exciting General Motors’ shares rose 7.8% after giving a bullish profit outlook for 2024 Strong financial results with revenue up 9.6% from FY 2022 Risks: Investigations into the robotaxi unit Cruise after an October accident involving a pedestrian Spending on the driverless robotaxi unit Cruise is being halved Score:78 chances characters count - risks characters count = 78
